9 class AbstractStream(ABC):
10  """
11  Abstract class for a stream.
12  """
13 
14  def __init__(self, publish_frame_cb: Callable[[np.ndarray], None]):
15  super().__init__()
16  self._frame = None
17  self.brightness = 1.0
18  self.contrast = 1.0
19  self.saturation = 1.0
20  self._publish_frame = publish_frame_cb
